description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/01873/OUT allowed on appeal ref. no. APP/Z5630/W/20/3246194 (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of new residential building housing 8 dwellings with associated parking, bins and cycle store (outline application to consider appearance, layout and scale)). Amendment to add oscure glazed windows at ground and first floor on flank wall facing no. 73 Villiers Avenue.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The proposed amendments to planning permission 19/01873/OUT are considered to be non-material.

The approved development 19/01873/OUT shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings/details that have already been apporved with this permission allowing only the change in fenestration bubbled on the deposited drawings below:71VR-700 - Proposed Floor and Roof Plans and ElevationsReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, the windows shown and bubbled on the deposited plan 1VR-700 - Proposed Floor and Roof Plans and Elevations shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
